attributes.action: Lady Thatcher: Honour our greastest peacetime and only female leader with the State Funeral she deserves!
attributes.additional_details:
Lady Thatcher should be entitled to a State Funeral for her tireless efforts taking a broken britain to a prosperous one before leaving office.

Mistakes may have been made during her long term, however this is only human, and her mistakes were far outweighed by the benefits she brought to society.
